abstract: The long list tentatively includes the punky, garage-y rock of Fidlar, Pujol and Bleached,the floaty hip-hop of Main Attrakionz, the synth-loving Teen Daze, AraabMuzik, the poppy Motopony, the moody Exitmusic and a lot of other bands on the pathways in between.
snippet: The long list tentatively includes the punky, garage-y rock of Fidlar, Pujol and Bleached,the floaty hip-hop of Main Attrakionz, the synth-loving Teen Daze, AraabMuzik, the poppy Motopony, the moody Exitmusic and a lot of other bands on the pathways...
lead_paragraph: I'm going to be bouncing around the Lower East Side tonight and bouncing in and out of a promising lineup at Santos Party House below Canal, hoping that set times dovetail nicely. Which, of course, they won't.
